personalInfo.about: Hi, I'm Front-End Developer in the making. Currently studying Bachelor of Science in Information Technology, Major in Web and Mobile Application at Tarlac State University.

I love turning ideas into clean, responsive, and interactive web experiences. My main focus is on building modern UI/UX with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, while also exploring design tools and frameworks like Tailwind CSS and Bootstrap.
Outside coding, you’ll probably catch me doing art, exercising, or learning languages. I’m constantly looking for opportunities to grow and collaborate on exciting projects.
